name: Bionaomh
description:
As Game Design students, we had to create a game that promotes eco-friendly behaviors and the protection of the environment.

That is why we decided to follow Boris, our modern druid neophyte, on his journey to
become an accomplished druid. To do that, his teacher sent him on a hard, yet essential mission : clean up the world from the garbage people left on the floor.  

Boris will have to go on an adventure across the world. He will encounter different biomes, each with their own personnality, from a magical forest, to a mysterious swamp, through a hot desertic zone.

- The team : 

             Bergougnoux Leo : Game Design / 2D&3D Infography / Sound Design

             Bresolin Sheila : Game Design / Programming / 2D&3D Infography

             Duhamel Maxime : Game Design / Programming / Level Design

             Camus Elodie : Game Design / 2D&3D Infography / Project Management

You can find the apk link below, and if you'd like to help us get better at making games, you can fill the following form after playing !

 https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfEAob947HPa4UXoVJe8pjCwMsXvwNP3r008eTu...
